game.name: Classical Hippo Hunting
game.description:
Many of you might want to be a sharp shooter but finding an environment where you can practice your shooting abilities seems to be a pretty difficult. However, when you choose a virtual world to stay, plenty of opportunities will be there to give your shooting skills a little boost. Today we have got you covered with a latest action-packed challenge where you have to shoot the hippo to control their growth. Grab your rifle and gear up to hunt them fast in Classical Hippo Hunting!
Find your target and try to aim your rifle with the maximum precision possible! Taking precision shots will definitely help to enjoy the clean kills in this free online shooting game. Make sure to avoid the killing of other animals. The problem is that these hippos have been infected with some severe health issues and you are the only one who knows how to use the sniper rifle. We know that killing of any wild animals is illegal, but you have to do it to keep the other population safe. 
You are sure to enjoy a lot in this awesome hunting simulation game that is made for both boys and girls. Your objective is to kill and hunt the maximum number of hippos without shooting any other animals. You can complete the level only if you achieve your task timely. So, aim your target carefully with your rifle and shoot all the hippos that you see on the screen. Good luck to clean the area from all the infected hippos to clear all the levels and enjoy this hippo 3D hunting game without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Classical Hippo Hunting at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
